    • Uses of PersonnagePrincipal in armes

      Methods in armes with parameters of type PersonnagePrincipal 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Arme.trouverObjCoffre​(Chest coffre, PersonnagePrincipal joueur)
      Make the player get the weapon found on the ground when he opens the chest he is looking at
      void Arme.trouverObjSol​(Salle salle, PersonnagePrincipal joueur)
      Make the player get the weapon found on the ground when he exams the room where he's located

    • Uses of PersonnagePrincipal in combat

      Methods in combat with parameters of type PersonnagePrincipal 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void Combat.affPV​(PersonnagePrincipal joueur, Monstre ennemi)
      Displays health points of the player and the enemy he's facing (and the support's if the support follows the mate)
      static void Combat.combattre​(PersonnagePrincipal joueur, Monstre ennemi)
      Starts a fight between 2 characters, the player and a monster
      static void Combat.esquive​(PersonnagePrincipal joueur, Monstre ennemi)
      The player dodges the monster's attack
